BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-ScipionExtensions
BundleInfo.Author: Roberto Marabini
BundleInfo.Synopsis: Command to allow interaction between scipion and chimera
BundleInfo.Description: scipionwrite: saves model file scipionss: saves chimera session scipionrs: restores chimera sesion scipioncombine: combines two models scipionshell: shows the density of a 3D Map on a spherical shell of the map at a given radius scipionshellcrown: shows a shell of a 3D map between two radii scipion: summary with all scipion related commands

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: ChimeraX :: Command :: scipionwrite :: General :: Save a model file (3dmap or atomic model) so Scipion may import it
ChimeraX :: Command :: scipionss :: General :: Save session, it may be recovered from scipion
ChimeraX :: Command :: scipionrs :: General :: Restore last chimera session saved with scipionss
ChimeraX :: Command :: scipioncombine :: General :: Combine two models
ChimeraX :: Command :: scipionshell :: General :: shows the density of a 3D Map on a spherical shell of the map at a given radius r
ChimeraX :: Command :: scipionshellcrown :: General :: shows a shell of a 3D map between two radii
ChimeraX :: Command :: scipion :: General :: summary with all scipion related commands
